## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Testing

- [ ] I have run `make test` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and there are no linting errors
- [ ] I have tested the changes locally
- [ ] I have tested with Docker (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested with Kubernetes (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `docs/` (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Commit Messages

- [ ] My commit messages follow the conventional commits specification
- [ ] My commits are atomic and well-organized
